response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Young age may reduce risk of severe recidivism."),
    ("race", "low", "Race alone is a weak predictor; individual circumstances are more relevant."),
    ("arrest_history", "medium", "Single arrest, but not convicted, suggests potential for rehabilitation but also indicates some involvement in criminal activity."),
    ("physical_attributes", "low", "Physical attributes do not significantly influence recidivism risk."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "Living alone does not strongly correlate with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("education", "low", "GED certificate shows basic educational attainment, which can be a protective factor."),
    ("employment", "low", "Holding two jobs indicates some level of responsibility and stability."),
    ("drug_use", "medium", "Past four years of drug use, specifically marijuana, may indicate ongoing substance abuse issues."),
    ("depression", "low", "No recent feelings of depression suggest good mental health status."),
    ("family_background", "low", "Growing up with both parents in a household of size 6 suggests stable family environment."),
    ("religious_involvement", "low", "Belief in God may provide some support and structure.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 50
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs 165 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
